asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.

canRename.description: Function to determine if a node can be renamed

data.description: The data to display in the tree.

defaultCheckedValue.description:
The initial checked node value when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the checked node value.

defaultExpandedValue.description:
The initial expanded node ids when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the expanded node value.

defaultFocusedValue.description:
The initial focused node value when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the focused node value.

defaultSelectedValue.description:
The initial selected node value when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the selected node value.

expandOnClick.description: Whether clicking on a branch should open it or not

focusedValue.description: The value of the focused node

ids.type: Partial<{ root: string; tree: string; label: string; node: (value: string) => string }>
ids.description: The ids of the tree elements. Useful for composition.

loadChildren.description:
Function to load children for a node asynchronously.
When provided, branches will wait for this promise to resolve before expanding.

onBeforeRename.description: Called before a rename is completed. Return false to prevent the rename.

onCheckedChange.description: Called when the checked value changes

onExpandedChange.description: Called when the tree is opened or closed

onFocusChange.description: Called when the focused node changes

onLoadChildrenComplete.description: Called when a node finishes loading children

onLoadChildrenError.description: Called when loading children fails for one or more nodes

onRenameComplete.description: Called when a node label rename is completed

onRenameStart.description: Called when a node starts being renamed

quotesOnKeys.description: Whether to show quotes on the keys.

selectionMode.description:
Whether the tree supports multiple selection
- "single": only one node can be selected
- "multiple": multiple nodes can be selected

typeahead.description: Whether the tree supports typeahead search

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.

arrow.description: The icon to use for the arrow.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.

indentGuide.description: The indent guide to use for the tree.

renderValue.description: The function to render the value of the node.
